verses.verse: וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> But king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> Solomon אָהַ֞ב <WH157> loved נָשִׁ֧ים <WH802> women נָכְרִיּ֛וֹת <WH5237> strange רַבּ֖וֹת <WH7227> many וְאֶת־ <WH853> בַּת־ <WH1323> together with the daughter פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh מוֹאֲבִיּ֤וֹת <WH4125> women of the Moabites עַמֳּנִיּוֹת֙ <WH5984> Ammonites אֲדֹ֣מִיֹּ֔ת <WH130> Edomites צֵדְנִיֹּ֖ת <WH6722> Zidonians חִתִּיֹּֽת׃ <WH2850> [and] Hittites

מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> Of the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָֽמַר־ <WH559> said יְהוָה֩ <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> Ye shall not go in בָהֶ֗ם וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> to these לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> to them neither shall they come in בָכֶ֔ם אָכֵן֙ <WH403> unto you [for] surely יַטּ֣וּ <WH5186> they will turn away אֶת־ <WH853> לְבַבְכֶ֔ם <WH3824> your heart אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their gods בָּהֶ֛ם דָּבַ֥ק <WH1692> clave שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon לְאַהֲבָֽה׃ <WH160> love

וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> had ל֣וֹ נָשִׁ֗ים <WH802> wives שָׂרוֹת֙ <WH8282> princesses שְׁבַ֣ע <WH7651> And he had seven מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred וּפִֽלַגְשִׁ֖ים <WH6370> concubines שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> and three מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַיַּטּ֥וּ <WH5186> turned away נָשָׁ֖יו <WH802> and his wives אֶת־ <WH853> לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> his heart

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become לְעֵת֙ <WH6256> For it came to pass when זִקְנַ֣ת <WH2209> was old שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon נָשָׁיו֙ <WH802> [that] his wives הִטּ֣וּ <WH5186> turned away אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָב֔וֹ <WH3824> his heart אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> other וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become לְבָב֤וֹ <WH3824> and his heart שָׁלֵם֙ <WH8003> was not perfect עִם־ <WH5973> with יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> with the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <WH430> his God כִּלְבַ֖ב <WH3824> as [was] the heart דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> of David אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> For Solomon אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after עַשְׁתֹּ֔רֶת <WH6253> Ashtoreth אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> the goddess צִדֹנִ֑ים <WH6722> of the Zidonians וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> and after מִלְכֹּ֔ם <WH4445> Milcom שִׁקֻּ֖ץ <WH8251> the abomination עַמֹּנִֽים׃ <WH5984> of the Ammonites

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> did שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> And Solomon הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not מִלֵּ֛א <WH4390> and went not fully אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD כְּדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> as [did] David אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father ס

אָז֩ <WH227> Then יִבְנֶ֨ה <WH1129> build שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> Then did Solomon בָּמָ֗ה <WH1116> an high place לִכְמוֹשׁ֙ <WH3645> for Chemosh שִׁקֻּ֣ץ <WH8251> the abomination מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab בָּהָ֕ר <WH2022> in the hill אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [is] before יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וּלְמֹ֕לֶךְ <WH4432> and for Molech שִׁקֻּ֖ץ <WH8251> the abomination בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וְכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Thus עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> And likewise did לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all נָשָׁ֖יו <WH802> wives הַנָּכְרִיּ֑וֹת <WH5237> he for all his strange מַקְטִיר֥וֹת <WH6999> which burnt incense וּֽמְזַבְּח֖וֹת <WH2076> and sacrificed לֵאלֹהֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH430> unto their gods

וַיִּתְאַנַּ֥ף <WH599> was angry יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD בִּשְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> with Solomon כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because נָטָ֣ה <WH5186> was turned לְבָב֗וֹ <WH3824> because his heart מֵעִ֤ם <WH5973> from יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> from the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַנִּרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> which had appeared אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him פַּעֲמָֽיִם׃ <WH6471> unto him twice

וְצִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> And had commanded אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> him concerning this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לְבִ֨לְתִּי־ <WH1115> should not לֶ֔כֶת <WH1980> go אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> other וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֔ר <WH8104> but he kept אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> not that which the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Wherefore the LORD לִשְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> unto Solomon יַ֚עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָֽיְתָה־ <WH1961> become זֹּ֣את <WH2063> likewise עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> have not שָׁמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <WH8104> Forasmuch as this is done of thee and thou hast not kept בְּרִיתִ֣י <WH1285> my covenant וְחֻקֹּתַ֔י <WH2708> and my statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <WH6680> which I have commanded עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> and קָרֹ֨עַ <WH7167> thee I will surely אֶקְרַ֤ע <WH7167> rend אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <WH4467> the kingdom מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and וּנְתַתִּ֖יהָ <WH5414> from thee and will give לְעַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> it to thy servant

אַךְ־ <WH389> Nevertheless בְּיָמֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH3117> Notwithstanding in thy days לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶעֱשֶׂ֔נָּה <WH6213> I will not do לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> the sake דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> it for David אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> thy father's מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> it out of the hand בִּנְךָ֖ <WH1121> of thy son אֶקְרָעֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7167> sake [but] I will rend

רַ֤ק <WH7535> Howbeit אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמַּמְלָכָה֙ <WH4467> all the kingdom לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֶקְרָ֔ע <WH7167> I will not rend away שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> tribe אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> [but] will give לִבְנֶ֑ךָ <WH1121> to thy son לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> the sake דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> for David עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant's וּלְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> the sake יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> sake and for Jerusalem's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּחָֽרְתִּי׃ <WH977> sake which I have chosen

וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> stirred up יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD שָׂטָן֙ <WH7854> an adversary לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> unto Solomon אֵ֖ת <WH853> הֲדַ֣ד <WH1908> Hadad הָאֲדֹמִ֑י <WH130> the Edomite מִזֶּ֧רַע <WH2233> seed הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> he [was] of the king's ה֖וּא <WH1931> he בֶּאֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> in Edom

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּֽהְי֤וֹת <WH1961> came דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> For it came to pass when David אֶת־ <WH854> was in אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> was in Edom בַּעֲל֗וֹת <WH5927> was gone up יוֹאָב֙ <WH3097> and Joab שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> the captain הַצָּבָ֔א <WH6635> of the host לְקַבֵּ֖ר <WH6912> to bury אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲלָלִ֑ים <WH2491> the slain וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> after he had smitten כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> every male בֶּאֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> in Edom

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שֵׁ֧שֶׁת <WH8337> (For six חֳדָשִׁ֛ים <WH2320> months יָֽשַׁב־ <WH3427> remain שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there יוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> did Joab וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> there with all Israel עַד־ <WH5704> until הִכְרִ֥ית <WH3772> until he had cut off כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> every male בֶּאֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> Edom

וַיִּבְרַ֣ח <WH1272> fled אֲדַ֡ד <WH1908> Hadad הוּא֩ <WH1931> he וַאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH376> and certain אֲדֹמִיִּ֜ים <WH130> Edomites מֵעַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> servants אָבִ֛יו <WH1> of his father's אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for לָב֣וֹא <WH935> with him to go מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וַהֲדַ֖ד <WH1908> Hadad נַ֥עַר <WH5288> child קָטָֽן׃ <WH6996> [being] yet a little

וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> And they arose מִמִּדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> out of Midian וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came פָּארָ֑ן <WH6290> to Paran וַיִּקְחוּ֩ <WH3947> and they took אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH582> men עִמָּ֜ם <WH5973> from מִפָּארָ֗ן <WH6290> with them out of Paran וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> and they came מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> to Egypt אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> which gave ל֣וֹ בַ֗יִת <WH1004> him an house וְלֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> him victuals אָ֣מַר <WH559> and appointed ל֔וֹ וְאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> him land נָ֥תַן <WH5414> and gave לֽוֹ׃

וַיִּמְצָא֙ <WH4672> found הֲדַ֥ד <WH1908> And Hadad חֵ֛ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight פַרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> great וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> so that he gave ל֤וֹ אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> him to wife אֶת־ <WH853> אֲח֣וֹת <WH269> the sister אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> of his own wife אֲח֖וֹת <WH269> the sister תַּחְפְּנֵ֥יס <WH8472> of Tahpenes הַגְּבִירָֽה׃ <WH1377> the queen

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <WH3205> bare ל֜וֹ אֲח֣וֹת <WH269> And the sister תַּחְפְּנֵ֗יס <WH8472> of Tahpenes אֵ֚ת <WH853> גְּנֻבַ֣ת <WH1592> him Genubath בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son וַתִּגְמְלֵ֣הוּ <WH1580> weaned תַחְפְּנֵ֔ס <WH8472> whom Tahpenes בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> in בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become גְנֻבַת֙ <WH1592> and Genubath בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> household פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> was in Pharaoh's בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> of Pharaoh

וַהֲדַ֞ד <WH1908> And when Hadad שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard בְּמִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> in Egypt כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁכַ֤ב <WH7901> slept דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> that David עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> with his fathers וְכִי־ <WH3588> for מֵ֖ת <WH4191> was dead יוֹאָ֣ב <WH3097> and that Joab שַֽׂר־ <WH8269> the captain הַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> of the host וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הֲדַד֙ <WH1908> Hadad אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> to Pharaoh שַׁלְּחֵ֖נִי <WH7971> Let me depart וְאֵלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> may go אֶל־ <WH413> to אַרְצִֽי׃ <WH776> to mine own country

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said ל֣וֹ פַרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> Then Pharaoh כִּ֠י <WH3588> nevertheless מָה־ <WH4100> what אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> have you חָסֵר֙ <WH2638> unto him But what hast thou lacked עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with וְהִנְּךָ֥ <WH2005> behold מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> with me that behold thou seekest לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to go אֶל־ <WH413> about אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <WH776> common וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> said לֹ֔א <WH3808> Nothing כִּ֥י <WH3588> nevertheless שַׁלֵּ֖חַ <WH7971> Nothing howbeit let me go תְּשַׁלְּחֵֽנִי׃ <WH7971> in any wise

וַיָּ֨קֶם <WH6965> stirred him up אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> And God לוֹ֙ שָׂטָ֔ן <WH7854> [another] adversary אֶת־ <WH853> רְז֖וֹן <WH7331> Rezon בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶלְיָדָ֑ע <WH450> of Eliadah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בָּרַ֗ח <WH1272> which fled מֵאֵ֛ת <WH853> הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <WH1909> Hadadezer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king צוֹבָ֖ה <WH6678> of Zobah אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <WH113> from his lord

וַיִּקְבֹּ֤ץ <WH6908> And he gathered עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> and became שַׂר־ <WH8269> unto him and became captain גְּד֔וּד <WH1416> over a band בַּהֲרֹ֥ג <WH2026> slew דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> when David אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וַיֵּלְכ֤וּ <WH1980> went דַמֶּ֙שֶׂק֙ <WH1834> to Damascus וַיֵּ֣שְׁבוּ <WH3427> and dwelt בָ֔הּ וַֽיִּמְלְכ֖וּ <WH4427> therein and reigned בְּדַמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <WH1834> in Damascus
